description.narrative: This activity (SNP - Technical Advice to Government) is a component of Solar Nigeria Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £8,458,216. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Energy generation, renewable sources - multiple technologies, Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Baker Tilly Nigeria. The start date is 01-10-2014 and the end date is 31-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Energy generation, renewable sources - multiple technologies

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2015 Quarter 3
